output.analysis:
Let me analyze this post according to the given criteria:
1. CMF Number: - No CMF number is visible in the post content
2. Refers to Candidate: - Yes, directly refers to MIRCEA-DAN GEOANĂ, a presidential candidate - The post is promoting a strategic alliance between Geoană and Cristian Lungu
3. Addresses Wide Population: - Yes, this is a paid advertisement on Facebook and Instagram - Targeting a large audience (100,001-500,000 people) - Already reached 4,000-4,999 impressions
4. Electoral Objective: - Yes, clearly promotes a political alliance for electoral purposes - Specifically mentions "viitorul politic al României" - Promotes the candidate during the electoral period
5. Journalism vs Propaganda: - This appears to be promotional content rather than journalistic - The title and description suggest a favorable portrayal of the alliance - Links to what appears to be a promotional article
6. Personal Opinion: - This is not a personal opinion but a coordinated, paid promotional campaign

conclusion.electoral-propaganda-analysis: This constitutes electoral propaganda because: - It directly promotes a presidential candidate (Mircea Geoană) - It's a paid advertisement reaching a large audience - It promotes political alliances and future political plans - It's being run after the end of the presidential campaign period
conclusion.message-for-police: "Opinii Independente", pentru incalcarea articolului 55 t) din Legea 370/2004, prin difuzarea de materiale de propagandă electorală după încheierea campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidențiale. Postarea cu ID-ul 491454140618987 promovează candidatul Mircea-Dan Geoană și alianțele sale politice, fiind o reclamă plătită pe Facebook și Instagram, cu un buget între 100-199 RON, care a ajuns la 4,000-4,999 de persoane. Postarea este activă și după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, încălcând astfel prevederile legale privind încheierea campaniei electorale pentru alegerile prezidențiale.
